title: Kristen Stewart dons crop top at Personal Shopper premiere
title_page: Kristen Stewart dons crop top at Personal Shopper premiere | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's showcased her daring new platinum blonde 'do earlier this week.
And continuing her style overhaul, Kristen Stewart put her best fashion foot forward as she stepped out in New York in a tummy teasing look, following the premiere of her new flick Personal Shopper on Thursday night.
The 26-year-old beauty displayed her toned stomach in a chic cotton black crop top that skimmed her naval as she changed her outfit for the second time in the night.
Scroll down for video
Two outfits for one night: Kristen Stewart put her best fashion foot forward as she stepped out in New York in a tummy teasing look, following the premiere of her new flick Personal Shopper on Thursday night
The Café Society star highlighted her slender frame, slipping on a pair of black trousers with white pinstripe detail as she left her SUV.
Her pin elongating pants grazed her calves while highlighting her black fishnet socks which gave her outfit an edgy touch.
Adding volume to her streamline work, she wrapped a nineties inspired bomber jacket with eye-catching orange lining around her.
She accessorised her new hairstyle and minimal look with a number of lock inspired necklaces, while covering her peepers with a pair of brown lens circular shades.
Tummy teasing: The 26-year-old beauty displayed her toned stomach in a chic cotton black crop top that skimmed her naval as she changed her outfit for the second time in the night
Walk this way: The Café Society star highlighted her slender frame, slipping on a pair of black trousers with white pinstripe detail as she left her SUV
Selfie! Accentuating her petite frame, she slipped on a pair of trainers while talking selfies with waiting fans
Accentuating her petite frame, she slipped on a pair of trainers while talking selfies with waiting fans and picking up an abandoned brown paper bag.
The buzz-cut beauty worked a dramatic smokey eye that highlighted her ice coloured locks furthermore.
Her lively appearance comes moments following her elegant fashionable display at the premiere of her new film Personal Shopper in New York City on Thursday night.
Work it: Adding volume to her streamline work, she wrapped a nineties inspired bomber jacket with eye-catching orange lining around her
Party pals: Kristen and her co-star Zosia Mamet caught up at the post-premiere party
Chat it out: The beauty leaned in and spoke to her pal, who dazzled in a thigh-slimming black mini dress
Party pals! The two pose together for a photo as they celebrated the Personal Shopper premiere
Still celebrating: Kristen and director Olivier Assayas continued to party well into the night after attending the premiere
The Twilight actress showed off her newly cropped blonde hair as she walked the red carpet hours after explaining during an interview with The Today Show why she decided to cut it off in the first place.
'It's practical,' she revealed. 'I mean, I'm not going to be able to have touch-ups once they put the helmet on my head.'
The actress is referring to her new role in Underwater, directed by William Eubank, in where she plays a mechanical engineer who works on an oil rig.
Drastic contrast: Kristen rocked the contrast between edgy and elegant at the Personal Shopper premiere earlier in the night
What a difference! The actress showed off her newly cropped blonde hair as she walked the red carpet
She says it wasn't required for the role, but when the director suggested it as part of her character, Kristen decided to go for it.
The actress opted to wear a floor-length silver gown with a high neckline that sat close around her neck.
The dress showed off her broad, thin shoulders at the front and hung down loosely around her toned body.
Gorgeous style: The actress opted to wear a floor-length silver gown with a high neckline that sat close around her neck and was completely open at the back
The front of the dress was fitted with pocket detailing to give the gorgeous gown a more casual feel.
Kristen, who has always maintained a trim figure, looked ravishing from the back as the dressed showed off her tiny, toned frame and elegant back.
The Twilight star decided to go with very dark makeup around her eyes, which helped create the contrast between her edgy new hairdo and the elegance of her premiere gown.
She wore very little highlighter or other makeup on her face and chose to wear a very neutral lipstick to allow her eyes to really pop.
It fits well: The dress showed off her broad, thin shoulders at the front and hung down loosely around her toned body
Personal Shopper is a psychological thriller which centres on a ghost story set in the fashion underworld of Paris.
Kristen's character is grieving the death of her twin brother, and spends time at his Paris home determined to make contact with his spirit.
The film has received rather mixed reviews, but it seems reviewers are not blaming Kristen for the quality of the picture.
Model Andreja Pejic also attended the premiere in a denim-inspired two-piece outfit
Model Andreja Pejic also attended the premiere in a denim-inspired two-piece outfit.
The off-the-shoulder look featured puffy sleeves and a a slim denim pencil skirt.
She paired the outfit with sassy red boots and wore her bleached hair parted down the center hanging down past her shoulders.
Mini chic: Girls star Zosia Mamet made an appearance at the event, staying on-trend with a black choker around her neck, paired with a plunging black mini dress
Understated elegance: She wore her light hair casually parted down the center in a low bun at the base of her neck and large dangling hoop earrings to complete her look
Fun after the premiere: Zosia and actor Evan Jonigkeit attend the after-party for the "Personal Shopper" New York Premiere
Girls star Zosia Mamet made an appearance at the event, staying on-trend with a black choker around her neck, paired with a plunging black mini dress.
She wore her light hair casually parted down the center in a low bun at the base of her neck and large dangling hoop earrings to complete her look.
The daughter of famous play write David Mamet looked relaxed and elegant as she posed for the cameras.
Cute and sexy: Reality star Olivia Palermo also attended the event in an all-black suit and black slip-on tennis shoes
Reality star Olivia Palermo also attended the event in an all-black suit and black slip-on tennis shoes.
She also chose to wear a choker around her neck and opted for a sleek hairstyle with her blonde hair parted down the center.
Carrying a coordinating black purse, the socialite also had her nails painted black to complete the monochromatic look.
Dynamic duo: Director Olivier Assayas posed with Kristen on the red carpet as they promoted their film
